Dear Ron

To comment briefly on your fascinating and enigmatic tsuba, the 
=
openings at the four corners of the guard are reminiscent, to me, of 
the e=
ntrants that are more commonly tri-lobed, and appear singly on 
old, aoie-s=
haped tsuba.  Not that this is of any help at all of 
course, since I belie=
ve that nobody has yet proposed a possible 
significance for these!

Regard=
s, John L.

.>

ge

that=

what I'm se=
eing on the posted view. I find this rather fascinating 
little tsuba, my r=
eason for seeking some feedback from fresh eyes.
